elements.name: Verify Admin can successfully create a new Main Category

steps.name: the API server is up and running
the user is authenticated as "admin"
the user sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with name "Catcus" and no parent
the API response status code should be 201
the response body should contain the field "name" with string value "Catcus"
the response body should contain the field "id"
the response body should contain the field "subCategories"

elements.name: Verify successful creation of a Sub-Category

steps.name: the API server is up and running
the user is authenticated as "admin"
the user sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with name "Flower_99" and parent ID 1
the API response status code should be 201
the response body should contain the field "name" with string value "Flower_99"
the response body should contain the field "id"

result.error_message:

elements.name: Verify validation for Category Name Length (Min 3 chars)

steps.name: the API server is up and running
the user is authenticated as "admin"
the user sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with name "AB" and no parent
the API response status code should be 400
the response body should contain the field "error" with string value "BAD_REQUEST"
the response body should contain the field "message" with string value "Validation failed"

elements.name: Verify Unique Name Constraint (Prevent Duplicate Categories)

steps.name: the API server is up and running
the user is authenticated as "admin"
the user sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with name "Catcus" and no parent
the API response status code should be 400
the response body should contain the field "error" with string value "DUPLICATE_RESOURCE"
the response body should contain the field "message" with string value "Main category 'Catcus' already exists"

elements.name: Verify Role-Based Access Control (User Restriction)

steps.name: the API server is up and running
the user is authenticated as "user"
the user sends a POST request to "/api/categories" with name "NewCat" and no parent
the API response status code should be 403
the response body should contain the field "error" with string value "Forbidden"

elements.name: Verify successful retrieval of a specific category with a valid ID

steps.name: the API server is up and running
the user is authenticated as "user"
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/10"
the API response status code should be 200
the response body should contain the field "id" with value 10
the response body should contain the field "name"

elements.name: Verify system behavior when searching for a Non-Existent Category ID

the user is authenticated as "user"
the user sends a GET request to "/api/categories/99999"
the API response status code should be 404
the response body should contain the field "error" with string value "NOT_FOUND"
the response body should contain the field "message" with string value "Category not found: 99999"

elements.name: Verify Admin can successfully add a new Main Category

steps.name: the user is on the Category Management page
the user clicks the "Add A Category" button
the user enters "Lotus" in the Category Name field
the user leaves the Parent Category empty
the user clicks the Save button
a success message should be displayed
the user should be redirected to the Category List
the new category "Lotus" should appear in the list

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user logs in with valid credentials

elements.name: Verify Admin is prevented from creating a category with an empty Name

steps.name: the user opens the Category Management page
the user clicks the "Add A Category" button
the user leaves the Category Name field empty
the user leaves the Parent Category empty
the user clicks the Save button
an error message should be displayed indicating the name is required
the user should remain on the Add Category page

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user logs in with valid credentials

elements.name: Verify Admin can successfully create a new Sub-Category

steps.name: the user opens the Category Management page
the user clicks the "Add A Category" button
the user enters "Lotus 001" in the Category Name field
the user selects "Lotus" from the Parent Category dropdown
the user clicks the Save button
a success message should be displayed
the user should be redirected to the Category List
the new category "Lotus 001" should appear in the list
the category "Lotus 001" should show "Lotus" as its parent

elements.name: Verify system prevents renaming a Sub-category to an existing name

steps.name: the user opens the Category Management page
the user clicks the "Add A Category" button
the user enters "Coconut" in the Category Name field
the user clicks the Save button
the user clicks the "Add A Category" button
the user enters "Coconut_A" in the Category Name field
the user selects "Coconut" from the Parent Category dropdown
the user clicks the Save button
the user clicks the "Add A Category" button
the user enters "Coconut_B" in the Category Name field
the user selects "Coconut" from the Parent Category dropdown
the user clicks the Save button
the user enters "Coconut_A" in the search box
the user clicks the Search button
the user clicks the Edit button for the searched category
the user enters "Coconut_B" in the Category Name field
the user clicks the Save button

name: Category Management (Standard User)
description:
As a Standard User
  I want to view categories
  So that I can see product organization
  But I should NOT be able to edit or delete them
